data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Manawatu-Wanganui. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manawatu-Wanganui, New Zealand

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Manawatu-Wanganui, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Manawatu-Wanganui, New Zealand.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Manawatu-Wanganui, New Zealand.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Somali people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Somali people know you.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Manawatu-Wanganui words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Manawatu-Wanganui with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Manawatu-Wanganui.
